knimeNode.name: Hilite Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Seperates hilited and not hilited rows.

fullDescription.intro: This node allows you to seperate hilited and not hilited rows of the given DataTable. The hilited rows are stored in a seperate DataTable, as well as the not hilited rows. Both DataTables are returned. At the time of execution data points have to be hilited.

ports.dataOut: A filtered output table containing hilited rows only.

dataOut.name: Output table containing not hilited rows

ports.dataOut: A filtered output table containing not hilited rows only.
